basics.name: Koustuv Saha
basics.label: Researcher in Agricultural Economics
basics.summary: PhD Candidate in Agricultural Economics at Purdue University, with research focused on gendered structures in labor markets, intrahousehold decision-making, and agricultural productivity in developing countries.

location.address: Department of Agricultural Economics, Purdue University

work.name: Purdue University
work.summary: Conducting research in agricultural economics with a focus on market structures and policies. Working under the supervision of Dr. Jacob Ricker-Gilbert.
highlights: Analyzing the effects of agricultural trade policies on rural labor markets.
Developing econometric models to assess productivity impacts.

work.name: Purdue University
work.summary: Researched gender-based labor market participation and economic policies. Worked under the guidance of Dr. Kajal Gulati.
highlights: Led econometric analysis on non-tariff measures in agricultural trade.
Published findings on intrahousehold decision-making and productivity.

work.name: Indira Gandhi Institute of Development Research
work.summary: Conducted policy research on labor markets and economic development. Collaborated with Dr. Subrata Sarkar and Dr. Jayati Sarkar.
highlights: Worked on empirical studies addressing financial inclusion policies.
Co-authored research papers on labor market inequalities.
